types.html:
prendre de l'ampleur

  1. to be on the rise, to gather pace, to increase, to spread, to grow
    Ce phénomène prend de l'ampleur. ― This phenomenon is spreading.
trans: to be on the rise, to gather pace, to increase, to spread, to grow

title: prendre de l'ampleur
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pʁɑ̃.dʁə d(ə) l‿ɑ̃.plœʁ/
